altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.en: Torture Club Girls After School

altTitles.ja: 放課後の拷問少女

altTitles.vi: Câu Lạc Bộ Tra Tấn Của Các Nữ Sinh Sau Giờ Học

description.en:
After years of being unlucky with girls, Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal, cute girlfriend. However, after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami, he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?  
  


---
description.pt: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de "estudos humanísticos", que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?
description.vi: Sau nhiều năm đen đủi với các cô gái, Ishimaru Daito chỉ mong được tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung của mình bên một cô bạn gái bình thường và dễ thương. Tuy nhiên, sau khi thua một trò chơi trước hai tiền bối mới của mình là Sasahara Kiyoka và Tomochika Asami, cậu buộc phải tham gia câu lạc bộ <Nghiên Cứu Chủ Nghĩa Nhân Văn> thực chất lại là một câu lạc bộ Nghiên Cứu Tra Tấn. Liệu Ishimaru có được cuộc sống cao trung bình thường mà cậu hằng mong muốn?
description.pt-br: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de “estudos humanísticos”, que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?

altTitles.en: Glorious Tidal Wave
Glory Tide
The Glory of Haeil Roh
The Road to Glory

description.en: Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

altTitles.en: Flaming Fightball Girl Dodge Danko

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

title.en: Chronicles of Narnia: The Magician's Nephew

altTitles.ja: ナルニア国物語: 魔術師のおい

altTitles.ja-ro: Narnia Koku Monogatari: Majutsushi no Oi

altTitles.fr: Le Monde de Narnia : Le Neveu du magicien

description.en: On a daring quest to save a life, two friends are hurled into another world, where an evil sorceress seeks to enslave them. But then the lion Aslan's song weaves itself into the fabric of a new land, a land that will be known as Narnia. And in Narnia, all things are possible.
description.fr: Dans une quête audacieuse pour sauver une vie, deux amis sont projetés dans un autre monde, où une sorcière maléfique cherche à les asservir. Mais alors, le chant du lion Aslan se tisse dans le tissu d'une nouvelle terre, une terre qui sera connue sous le nom de Narnia. Et à Narnia, tout devient possible.

title.en: Intai Shita Ossan Kenja da ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Slow Life na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natteita~

altTitles.ja: 引退したおっさん賢者だが愛弟子が追放されてきたので傷心旅行に連れて行く ～スローライフな旅のつもりが、なぜか世界最強の師弟になっていた〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Intaishita Ossan Kenjada ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Surouraifu na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natte Ita~

altTitles.en: A Retired Old Sage Takes His Disciple on a Journey

He Is a Retired Old Sage, but His Beloved Disciple Has Been Expelled, So He Takes Her on a Heartbreak Trip ~He Intended to Travel in a Slow Life Fashion, but for Some Reason He Ended Up Becoming the World's Strongest Master and Disciple.~

altTitles.id: Seorang Sage Tua Yang Sudah Pensiun Mengajak Muridnya Dalam Sebuah Perjalanan

description.en:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.en: Genius Artist's Random Studio
The Genius Artist's Random Studio

description.en: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

altTitles.en: Three Part Struggle
Three Way Scramble
Three-way Struggle

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title.en: Menhera Usagi wa Yandere Ookami ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.ja: ヘブンバーンズレッド コミックアンソロジー

description.en:
A collection of short stories drawn by different mangakas based on the game Heaven Burns Red. 

Depicting the daily lives of the heroines, Focusing on the Unit 31-A.

Cover: GotoP
description.id:
Sebuah Antologi berisikan cerita-cerita pendek dari berbagai Mangaka yang berdasarkan dari gim Heaven Burns Red.

Menceritakan tentang Kehidupan sehari-hari para Heroine, terutama pada Unit 31-A.

Cover:GotoP

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――
description.vi: Anh Hùng Bị Bóc Lột Đến Cùng Cực, Được Quân Ma Vương Chiêu Mộ Với Đãi Ngộ Hậu Hĩnh ~ Dù Đứng Đầu Bảng Xếp Hạng Anh Hùng Nhưng Lương Thực Nhận Chẳng Đủ Sống Qua Ngày ~

altTitles.ja: スクールバック

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

altTitles.en: Love Bullet

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Nakabosudatta ―Hiroin Kenzoku-ka de Ikinokoru―

altTitles.ja: 転生したら序盤で死ぬ中ボスだった ―ヒロイン眷属化で生き残る―

altTitles.en: When I Reincarnated, I was a Mid-boss Who Died Early in the Game ―Survive by Becoming a Household Member with Heroine―

altTitles.vi: Chuyển sinh làm boss trung cấp

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生後是初期死亡中頭目 —靠著將女主角眷屬化而倖存—

description.en: When I woke up after an accident, I was reincarnated as a mid-boss destined to die in the early stages of the game! In order to avoid being killed by the hero who should come attacking soon, I will fight and make the women my subordinates to increase my allies!
description.ja:
事故に遭って目が覚めたら、ゲームの序盤で死ぬ中ボスに転生！やがて襲ってくるはずの勇者に殺されないために、××して女たちを眷属にして仲間を増やせ！
___
- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3298hj)

altTitles.en: Destruction Lover

altTitles.ja: 破滅の恋人

description.en:
Is the woman a ghost or a witch?
A chance encounter between a girl and a beautiful, but not ghostly, girl who lives in a haunted house like a secret base.

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!
description.es-la: Daiki, un chico de preparatoria al que no le va muy bien con las chicas, solo puede hablar con Wakaba, una chica a la que conoce desde la infancia. Pero un día, Wakaba aparece con un vestido ¿extraordinariamente lindo...?

title.ja: Chotto Dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikakete Kita

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

altTitles.en: Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!
A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
A Slightly Pushy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Slightly Clingy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Dark Elf With Love That's Only A Little Heavy Chased Me From Another World

description.en:
Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world.

One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world !! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata !! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused !! (in many ways).

Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?) !! A sweet and thick romantic comedy woven around the dark elf beauty's slightly heavy schizophrenic love !!!

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
description.id: Hinata, seorang siswa SMA yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain dan menjadi pahlawan dengan kekuatan Dewa. Mengalahkan Raja Iblis bersama Mariabel "Dark Elf", dan bersama teman-temannya. Penuhi keinginan Dewa dengan aman dan kembali ke dunia ini lagi. Satu bulan setelah itu, Hinata kembali ke dunianya, tetapi Mariabel juga datang ke sini dari dunia lain!! Alasan dia datang ke sini adalah untuk mengikuti Hinata yang dicintainya!! Dan hanya untuknya, Dia menyerang Hinata setiap kali dia menolaknya. cinta yang berat dan satu sendok teh kecemburuan!! (dalam banyak hal). Bisakah Hinata, yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup dengan Dark Elf, hidup dengan aman (?)!! Sebuah komedi romantis manis dan gravitasi yang menjalin dengan kecantikan Echizosic Dark Elf yang agak berat!!! (Manga ini terinpirasi dari manga H)
description.ja:
異世界に転生し、神の力で勇者になった高校生のヒナタ。ダークエルフのマリアベル、その仲間たちと共に魔王を討伐。無事、神の願いを叶えて現世へと帰還を果たす。
それから一カ月、現世に帰ったヒナタだったが、なぜかマリアベルが異世界からこちらに来てしまう!! こちらへ来た理由、それは愛しのヒナタと添い遂げるため!! しかも彼女、ヒナタにたいして少～～～～～しだけ重い愛と小さじ一杯分ぐらいの嫉妬心で事あるごとにヒナタを襲うのだった!!（色んな意味で）。
なし崩しでダークエルフと同棲することになったヒナタは無事（？）に暮らすことができるのか!!

ちょい重いダークエルフのエキゾチック美女と織りなす、甘くてグラビティな逆異世界同棲ラブコメ!!!

title.en: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~

altTitles.ja: アバンダンド〜強すぎて武器が壊れる勇者と武器職人のエルフ〜

altTitles.en: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith

altTitles.tr: Terk edilmiş: Her Silahı Kıracak Kadar Güçlü Kahraman ve Elf Silah Ustası

description.en: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

altTitles.ja: ヤニねこ

altTitles.en: Tar Cat

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
description.ja: マナーやモラルなんて関係ねえ！クズねこの送るヤニまみれでお下品な日常をご覧ください。一応、妹とか普通にかわいいキャラもでてくるから！単行本でしか見れない貴重な喫煙シーンとかたぶん描くんで、予約してくれたらありがてーにゃ(笑)

title.en: The Merman Trapped in My Lake

altTitles.en: A Merman I Imprisoned in My Lake
The Mermaid I Locked in My Lake

description.en: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.

altTitles.ja: 半妖の夜叉姫

altTitles.en: Princess Half-Demon

altTitles.ja: ～異伝・絵本草子～ 半妖の夜叉姫

description.en:
Can the three teenage daughters of demon dog half-brothers Inuyasha and Sesshomaru 
save their parents, themselves, and both realms from the menace of the seven mystical Rainbow Pearls?

Living in the present day isn’t easy for Sesshomaru’s daughter Towa. 
She can’t remember where she came from, must conceal her mysterious powers, 
and is either worshiped or feared by girls she just wants to be friends with. 
But she has no way of returning to her own time until the day 
a demon attacks and she is transported to feudal-era Japan.

There Towa, her twin sister Setsuma, and her cousin Moroha —Inuyasha’s daughter—
have a mission bestowed upon them by the mystical Tree of Ages. 
With only vague memories of their past to guide them, the three young women set out to find their parents, 
heal a rift in time, and fulfill their royal destiny...

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

altTitles.en: Go! Go! Loser Ranger!

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.ja: 世界各国にヒーローがいる中、日本のヒーローは“恥ずかしがり屋”の少女だった!! 彼女を待ち受けるのは…!?
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

title.en: I Became the Youngest Sister-in-law of the Ruined Reverse Harem’s Male Leads

altTitles.ko: 피폐 역하렘 남주들의 막내 처제가 되었다

altTitles.ko-ro: Pipye Yeokarem Namjudeurui Mangnae Cheoje-ga Doeeotda

description.en: Reincarnated in a ruined reverse harem novel, her sisters marry the male leads while she's left dealing with their overwhelming attention.

Don't think that mediocre men have no spring time.   
A little gangster that takes protection fees in front of the school entrance strangely became the highest administrator of hell. Now, things are getting interesting. Being King Yama, fighting the heavens, reforming hell's system, and leading ghosts to resist the oppression by the gods of heaven… Finally, I'm at the highest position within the heavens and hell.  
Mwahaha…

altTitles.ja: MURCIÉLAGO -ムルシエラゴ- BYPRODUCT -アラーニァ-

altTitles.en: Murcielago Arana

altTitles.ja: ムルシエラゴ- BYPRODUCT -アラーニァ

description.en: A spinoff of the series Murciélago featuring the character Reiko Kuchiba.

altTitles.en: Dino

altTitles.ja: ゴン
ゴン–GON–

description.en:
Long before the dawn of man, savage dinosaurs roamed the Earth. Now, only one remains — the smallest, wildest of them all! GON marches across the wilderness defending the friendly and furry from the mean and hungry. Told entirely without words, these stories highlight the amazingly detailed art and visual storytelling genius of creator Masashi Tanaka.  
  
Details:  
The first volume is read left-to-right  
  
---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Prize in 1998**


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (1994)
description.ru:
Задолго до появления человека по Земле бродили дикие динозавры. Теперь остался только один - самый маленький, самый дикий из всех!
Гон марширует по пустыне, защищая дружелюбных и пушистых от злых и голодных.

Рассказанные без слов, эти истории подчеркивают удивительно подробное искусство и гений визуального повествования создателя Масаси Танаки.
description.uk: Задовго до появи людей по Землі бродили дикі динозаври. Нині залишився лише один - найменший і найдикіший з усіх! Ґон мандрує дикою природою, захищаючи доброзичливих і пухнастих від злих і голодних. Історія, розказана без слів, підкреслює дивовижну майстерність геніального художника і візуального оповідача Масаші Танаки.
description.pt-br: Gon é um dinossauro de 60 centímetros de altura mas com força digna de qualquer outro tiranossauro. Genioso, faz tudo que é preciso para alcançar o que deseja. Criado por Masashi Tanaka no último capítulo da série Flash, esse bebê dinossauro tornou-se o personagem mais famoso do quadrinista, garantindo ao autor reconhecimento internacional.

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

altTitles.en: RuriDragon

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: This Monster Wants to Eat Me

altTitles.ja: 私を喰べたい、ひとでなし
Watashi wo Tabetai, Hitodenashi

altTitles.en: A Monster Wants to Eat Me

altTitles.vi: Có thứ muốn ăn thịt tôi

description.en: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.
description.ru: Старшеклассница Хинако живет обычной жизнью в городке на морском побережье. Однажды она встречает Шиори, загадочную девушку с глазами цвета океана, но вскоре оказывается, что Шиори — на самом деле русалка, которая наблюдала за Хинако уже долгое время.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか

altTitles.en: Will You End This Love?

altTitles.ja: Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

title.en: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family

description.en:
His talent was forged on the battlefield, but before he could fully develop it, he died.

However, when he opened his eyes again, he realized he had been reborn as Dane Sogres, the youngest son of a prestigious count.

The talent he now possessed... was not limited to just one field?!

A talent in spearmanship, assassination, magic, summoning, and even swordsmanship—which he had not been able to develop fully before!

He can finally nurture his endless talent in the embrace of the happy family he had always longed for.

"Spearmanship! Dane must absolutely learn spearmanship!"

"Are you saying that because you really don't know how useful learning stealth and assassination skills could be?"

"Magic is the future, Father, Mother!"

"For my younger brother... summoning would also be really nice..."

...Mm, this is a happy family, right?
description.ko:
전장에서 쓸쓸한 죽음을 맞이했는데,
명가의 사랑받는 막내아들로 다시 태어나다?

창술, 암살, 마법, 소환, 검술…
끝을 모르는 재능까지!

항상 바라왔던 행복한 가족들 속에서,
내가 가진 재능을 펼쳐 보이겠어!

title.en: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam 1/2 - U.C.0087 Another Story

altTitles.en: Gundam Zeta Half
Mobile Suit Z Gundam 1/2
Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Half

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ゼータガンダ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Z Gundam 1/2 - U.C.0087 Another Story

description.en:
Universal Century 0087, pilot Edgar Edmund Smith, a hero of the story. The pilot of the Titans originally drawn fierce battle Edgar Edmund Smith. This work, however, the year Universal Century 0138, Maddin was discovered manuscripts of Sicilian women writers who died last year, "Diary of Edmund Smith, Edgar," a setting of what was written. Does not exist at all other evidence that the description and the Universal Century of the time in the world, "a fact", and "mere fiction" has become a dispute with pilots and mobile suits that appeared in this film, really century, whether the universe exists in the world has become treated as the unknown.   
  
Episode 1: Half Zeta Gundam vs Gundam MK-II  
Episode 2: Amuro and Kiss!  
Episode 3: Diary of Edgar Edmund Smith  
Episode Extra: Diary of an Irresponsible Umonsamon Universe - Titans

altTitles.en: Castle Town Dandelion

altTitles.ja: 城下町のダンデライオン

description.en:
In the manga's story, the everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.

**NOTE:** Initially released as a 4-koma manga, Joukamachi no Dandelion has transitioned back to traditional format as of Vol.5 Chapter 49.

title.en: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.en:
I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me...

The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?
description.ja:
俺だけが知ってる、先輩の顔。俺のことが嫌いなはずの先輩に「好き」と言われてしまった───。

完璧だけどちょっぴり怖い生徒会長、『オオカミ先輩』こと狼川琉奈。そして、チャラくてポンコツな副会長・月山雄牙。二人はなにもかも正反対。ーーーひとつ、お互いに秘密の顔があることを除いて。ある時、月山は秘密にしているアルバイトを通じて、オオカミ先輩の裏の顔を知ることになり…!?

title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex
My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited... and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder brother." "Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent's remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent's feelings, decided on a 'sibling rule' where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?
___
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

altTitles.ja: 魔法先生ネギま！

altTitles.en: Negima! Magister Negi Magi

altTitles.th: คุณครูจอมเวท เนกิมะ!

description.en:
Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

---

Alternate official English:
- [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/193)

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.uk: Президентка Класу знайшла собі Слухняну Мазохістку

altTitles.tr: Sınıf başkanı ile mazoşist bir kız arasındaki yuri

altTitles.id: Kisah Bakung Antara Ketua Kelas dan Gadis Masokis

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

title.en: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaamama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.ja: アラサーママの私でいいの？

altTitles.zh: 三十多岁当妈的我也可以吗？

altTitles.vi: Bà mẹ đơn thân ngoài 30 như chị liệu ổn chứ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaa mama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.en: I'm around 30 is it OK with me?

altTitles.ru: С такой матерью как я, которой за 30, всё ли будет хорошо?

description.en: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
description.ru: 20 летний студент университета, говорит 32-летней матери-одиночки, что она ему нравится . Дело в том... Что он не особенно стесняется того, почему она ему нравится.
description.uk:
20-річний студент зізнався у коханні своїй 32-річній сусідці матері-одиначці. Справа в тому... Що він зовсім не *соромиться* розказувати про те, чому закоханий у неї.

[Офіційно] прохання виразити свої думки та враження від манґи у [цьому опитуванні.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform)
description.vi: Shiraishi Hanano là một người phụ nữ 32 tuổi. Một ngày nọ, cô nhận được lời tỏ tình từ người hàng xóm Yoshio-kun, một sinh viên đại học. Cậu ta khăng khăng muốn cưới cô ấy làm vợ, thậm chí không quan tâm cả việc cô ấy đã từng kết hôn hay có một đứa con gái
description.pt-br:
Uma mãe solteira de 32 anos ouve de seu vizinho, um estudante universitário de cerca de 20, que ele gosta dela. A coisa é… ele não é particularmente tímido sobre por que gosta dela.  
  
[Oficial] Por favor, responda [this survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform) para dar seus pensamentos e impressões!

title.en: Xie'e Lianjin Shushi Gao Buding Ziji De Shiyan Ti

altTitles.zh: 邪恶炼金术士搞不定自己的实验体

altTitles.zh-ro: Xié'è Liànjīn Shùshì Gǎo Bùdìng Zìjǐ De Shíyàn Tǐ

altTitles.zh-hk: 邪惡煉金術士搞不定自己的實驗體

altTitles.en: The Evil Alchemist Can't Handle His Own Experiment
The Evil Alchemist Can't Handle His Own Test Subject
Eunuch of Empire

altTitles.ja: 滅国の宦官

description.en:
Eunuchs, the only men allowed to serve in the secret garden known as the harem.
When a young eunuch named Jafar encounters three beautiful sisters there, their meeting shakes the country to its foundations!
Brought to you by the tag-team of Kotaro Shono, the artist of World's End Harem, and Kei Saikawa, the creator of Hero Organization, a tale of suspense in a beautiful, otherworldly country unfolds!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.es:
Los eunucos son los únicos hombres a los que se les permite servir en el jardín secreto conocido como el Harén.
Una gran conmoción que amenaza con sacudir los cimientos del imperio comienza con el encuentro entre Jafar, un joven eunuco, y tres deslumbrantes hermanas...
¡Una intrigante y emocionante historia de suspense ambientada en tierras exóticas, fruto de la colaboración entre Kotaro Shono, de "World's End Harem", y Kei Saikawa,de "Hero Organization"!

(Fuente: MangaPlus)
description.ja:
<毎週月曜更新>宦官。それは、秘密の花園・ハレムに仕えることが許された唯一の“男”。
国を揺るがす大動乱は、若き宦官・ジャフェルと見目麗しき3姉妹の出会いから始まる…！
『終末のハーレム』宵野コタローと『英雄機関』蔡河ケイの新タッグが紡ぐ、超美麗異国サスペンス！

title.en: Won't She Speak Well, That Girl Who Woke Up From a Dream?

altTitles.ja-ro: Yume kara Sameta Ano Ko to wa Kitto Umaku Shaberenai

altTitles.ja: 夢から覚めたあの子とはきっと上手く喋れない
魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

title.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm Official Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou Koushiki Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上~司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません~ 公式コミックアンソロジー
